flawed_nl_solution:
They approved 20% off of the $20 item so 0.2*20 = $<<20*0.01*20=4>>4
The item has a $4 discount which can be applied from his final total of $54 so 54-4 = $<<54-4=50>>50
Now he can use his 10% coupon on the $50 total so 0.1*50 = $<<10*0.01*50=5>>5
The total was $50 but his $5 discount now makes it 50-5 = $<<50-5=43>>43
#### 43

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 43. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
